alert.note: Alert for Archer; Baylor; Clay; Wichita (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 10:42PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Jefferson, southwestern Stephens, central Cotton, northern Clay, Archer, southern Wichita and Baylor Counties through 1130 PM CDT... At 1041 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking the leading edge of winds from thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Walters to 3 miles north of Sheppard AFB to 4 miles northeast of Seymour. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wichita Falls, Burkburnett, Henrietta, Seymour, Walters, Waurika, Archer City, Iowa Park, Holliday, Comanche, Temple, Ryan, Petrolia, Scotland, Byers, Dean, Randlett, Megargel, Jolly, and Hastings. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 0 and 22. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
